creator: bmargulies@yahoo.com
text:
setclasspath.sh should check for the existence of $JAVA_HOME/bin/sparcv9, and 
run the JVM from there if available.
The selection of a 32-bit or 64-bit JVM should be a user decision, not something Tomact does automatically if a 64-bit JVM is found.
creator: markt@apache.org
